## ProductSortInput interface

ProductSortInput is deprecated, use  instead. ProductSortInput specifies the attribute to use for sorting search results and indicates whether the results are sorted in ascending or descending order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductSortInput 
```
